summary: Completed comprehensive testing of EUFSI LCA Tool after iteration 2 fixes. Backend APIs 100% functional, Frontend UI 95%+ functional. MAJOR SUCCESS: LCA calculation now returns proper non-zero values (Climate Change: 2.43 kg CO2 eq). All core features working including results display, PDF generation, and project history.

design_issues.issue: Route /assessment/textile does not exist - users must access through homepage industry cards

passed_tests: Homepage loads with EU branding and all 4 industry cards
Results page displays NON-ZERO values correctly (Climate Change: 2.43 kg CO2 eq)
Water Use: 121.69 mÂ³, Fossil Depletion: 4.87 kg oil eq/MJ showing properly
All charts and visualizations working (bar charts, radar chart, pie chart)
Tab navigation working (Overview, Impact Categories, Contribution Analysis)
PDF download functionality works (file generated successfully)
History page shows 10 projects with proper status indicators
Backend API endpoints (12/12 tests passed - 100% success rate)
Project creation and data persistence working
LCA calculation engine producing meaningful results
Contribution analysis by life cycle stage working
Multiple impact categories displaying proper values

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (all major features working, minor routing issue)
success_percentage.integration: 100% (data flows correctly, calculations produce proper results)
